results.title: Track Outlook email by moving it to a tracked Exchange folder
results.description: Finally, since Morgan is the main contact person in Northwind Traders, all the emails from Morgan relate to this opportunity. Instead of manually copying the emails from Morgan, Nancy can create an Exchange rule that will automatically copy all the emails that Morgan sends to the Northwind Traders' folder. By doing so, the emails will be.

results.title: Tutorial: Prepare a JavaScript single-page app (SPA) for authentication - Microsoft identity platform
results.description: Tutorial: Prepare a JavaScript single-page app for authentication Applies to:  Workforce tenants  External tenants (learn more) In this tutorial you'll build a JavaScript single-page application (SPA) and prepare it for authentication using the Microsoft identity platform. This tutorial... It's used to create a server that hosts the application..
